title: Help
body: Hey I'm sorta new to League (been playing for a couple of months now) and was just wondering if I could have some in game help or people to play with that could help me out and teach me new things? Thanks. I use Katarina and Xerath at the moment as my main champions but I don't know what are the right builds and what to do exactly. {{champion:101}}

replies.body: [This is your board](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy), not Help & Support. We're more for technical issues than gameplay tips. I really think the boards should be renamed, as it's quite confusing.
